text:
Dog Control Amendment Order 2013

I make the following order under section 15A(2)(b) of the Dog Control Act 2000 .

8 January 2013

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Dog Control Amendment Order 2013 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 February 2013.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Dog Control Order 2011 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Dog Control Order 2011 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 16 January 2013

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
